title: Cargo throws an error when trying to compile with object code generated by c and with import libc
body:
I was attempting to get rust to call a c function by using extern "C" and it worked until i tried to import the libc crate which is when cargo build started throwing an error. I then removed the extern "C" declearation and the code compiled normlly so I think its a problem with the combination of extern "C" and use libc This is the rust code: ```rust #[link(name = "hello")] use libc; extern "C" { fn greet(); } fn main() { unsafe { greet(); } } ``` And this is the c code: ``` c #include #include void greet() { printf("Hello"); } ``` This is my cargo.toml ``` [package] name = "project" version = "0.1.0" authors = ["adimehrotra"] edition = "2018" [dependencies] libc = "0.2.74" ``` I expected the code code to compile and the rust code to call the c code, instead cargo build threw the error ``` error: linking with `cc` failed: exit code: 1 | = note: "cc" "-m64" "-L" "/Users/adimehrotra/.rustup/toolchains/stable-x86_64-apple-darwin/lib/rustlib/x86_64-apple-darwin/lib" "/Users/adimehrotra/Desktop/project/target/debug/deps/project.2hjprpzytrkym0zc.rcgu.o" "/Users/adimehrotra/Desktop/project/target/debug/deps/project.2pwuslmk506uafg4.rcgu.o" "/Users/adimehrotra/Desktop/project/target/debug/deps/project.2q2eogqn7p5k3u7s.rcgu.o" symbols for architecture x86_64: "_greet", referenced from: project::main::h501a37fa09c5db9f in project.2q2eogqn7p5k3u7s.rcgu.o ld: symbol(s) not found for architecture x86_64 clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation) error: aborting due to previous error; 1 warning emitted error: could not compile `project`. Caused by: process didn't exit successfully: `rustc --crate-name project --edition=2018 src/main.rs --error-format=json -- json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi --crate-type bin --emit=dep-info,link -Cembed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C metadata=d994b318832787ba --out-dir /Users/adimehrotra/Desktop/project/target/debug/deps -C incremental=/Users/adimehrotra/Desktop/project/target/debug/incremental -L dependency=/Users/adimehrotra/Desktop/project/target/debug/deps --extern libc=/Users/adimehrotra/Desktop/project/target/debug/deps/liblibc-15b83cac96623b8d.rlib -L libs/` (exit code: 1) ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.45.0 (5c1f21c3b 2020-07-13) binary: rustc commit-hash: 5c1f21c3b82297671ad3ae1e8c942d2ca92e84f2 commit-date: 2020-07-13 host: x86_64-apple-darwin release: 1.45.0 LLVM version: 10.0 ```
